issue.title: auth.rocketaccount.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://auth.rocketaccount.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fauth.rocketaccount.com) ### Comment > This domain is being blocked by a parental control blacklist. This is incorrect. This domain is used for Rocket Money account authentication and shouldn't be included in any filter. ``` Username: @tbrock47 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/klz8kqcrsqo44cc88sg0wcw4080k4kocv1651upsoo.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/qniopcbg1hwskgwswgw8wg8s0skocsoccgtrwepu7s.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS DNS setup: | AdGuard Home DNS server: | Private AdGuard DNS server System version: | `RaspberryPi4` Browser: | Chrome Blocklists: | General:
AdGuard DNS

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://rewards.ambire.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frewards.ambire.com%2F) ### Comment > Please help to mark the data from coingeko as safe. > After log-in with the wallet, click $WALLET from the left menu in order to see the attached. ``` Username: @Bushido1 ``` ### Screenshots
